law.catch_line: Promotion of soybean production and use in public interest.
law.text: It is declared to be in the interest of the public welfare that Kentucky farmers who are producers of soybeans shall be permitted and encouraged to act jointly and in cooperation with all producers, handlers, dealers and processors of soybeans in promoting and stimulating, by research, market development and education, the increased production, use and sale, domestic and foreign, of soybeans and soybean products.
